title: #75 Lori Harder on How to Go From Rock Bottom to the Top
description: Fitness world champion Lori Harder has learned the highs and low are all necessary for real change. Growing up an overweight outcast lead to bullying and a crippling anxiety set her on the transformative path to achieving the body, mind, and happiness she always wanted. The author of A Tribe Called Bliss explains why your lowest points are always lessons in disguise on this episode of Impact Theory with Tom Bilyeu. Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by: ButcherBox. Use the discount code: "IMPACT" at butcherbox.com to get 20$ off and FREE BACON Blinkist. Visit www.blinkist.com/IMPACT to try out the premium service completely free for 7 days! Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact SHOW NOTES: Lori describes the bullying from her childhood and the motivation it provided. [2:56] Lori breaks down reinventing her mentality and finding purpose in helping others. [8:50] Lori talks about anxiety and balancing her drive for success with the love of the journey. [13:46] Lori shares her life-changing revelations after getting kidnapped in Cancun. [22:50] Lori details staying hungry and finding balance after achieving success. [28:15] Lori gives advice to women unhappy with their body and people looking to rewrite their story. [32:45] Lori discusses her book’s key principles for developing self-awareness. [40:38] Lori reveals the impact she wants to have on the world. [45:10]   QUOTES: “Nothing changes if you don't change the internal. I had to free myself so I had to change the dialogue.” [7:20]   “You have to free yourself first, you have to heal yourself first, in order to help other people.” [7:47]   “Without those really hard times you just don't get the euphoria on the other side.” [21:30]   “So your rock bottom is literally where there is nothing else the whole reason you're here can finally come through because you're stripped of everything and all you have is the internal.” [27:22]   FOLLOW LORI HARDER: WEBSITE - https://bit.ly/2sf9sUc TWITTER - https://bit.ly/2IRzxUA YOUTUBE - https://bit.ly/2sj0Xrk FACEBOOK - https://bit.ly/2GXdV3c INSTAGRAM - https://bit.ly/2IQrPu3   PEOPLE MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE: Tony Robbins - https://bit.ly/2lzHbrc [35:45]   PODCASTS MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE: Earn Your Happy - https://bit.ly/2J92j2t [2:03]   COMPANIES MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE: The Bliss Project - https://bit.ly/2INGvK9 [1:45] The Bliss Habit - https://bit.ly/2shZ1zn [1:51] The Body and Soul Program - https://bit.ly/2LzA8b6 [1:53] Landmark Forum - https://bit.ly/1dAVQlw [39:00]   BOOKS MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE: A Tribe Called Bliss [2:25] - https://amzn.to/2GUCJJq
